original: 「要不是看在眾將官的面子，定要將你斬首謝罪！這次就免你一死！但你竟敢小瞧我，先打五十脊杖，若有再犯，再打五十！」
text: "If it were not for the face of the generals, I would definitely behead you and apologize! This time I will save you from death! But you dare to underestimate me, first hit fifty spine sticks, if you commit another crime, hit another fifty!"
